heading: ISC Class 11 â€“ Foundation for Board Success
subHeading: Build strong fundamentals and prepare for ISC Class 12 with our comprehensive study resources.
quickIntro: ISC Class 11 is the foundation year that sets the stage for your board exams. With specialized streams in Science, Commerce, and Humanities, this year is crucial for building strong subject knowledge and developing analytical skills. Our resources help you master concepts through structured learning and practice.

infoBox.target: School Exams, Foundation for ISC Class 12
infoBox.questions: Chapter-wise questions, sample papers, topic tests

featuresSection.title: Your Complete ISC Class 11 Learning Solution
featuresSection.subtitle: Stream-specific resources and practice materials for academic excellence.

examFeatures.title: Stream-wise Study Material
examFeatures.benefit: Comprehensive notes for all subjects in your chosen stream.
examFeatures.why: Builds strong conceptual foundation for Class 12 board exams.

examFeatures.title: Concept-based Questions
examFeatures.why: Reinforces learning and improves problem-solving skills.

examFeatures.title: Chapter-wise Tests
examFeatures.benefit: Assess your understanding of each topic.
examFeatures.why: Identifies areas needing more focus and practice.

examFeatures.title: Performance Tracking
examFeatures.why: Helps in focusing on weak areas and improving performance.

examFeatures.title: Quick Revision Notes
examFeatures.why: Saves time and helps in quick recall of important points.

examFeatures.title: Reference Materials
examFeatures.why: Enhances understanding with varied learning materials.

bottomBanner.title: Build a Strong Foundation for ISC Class 12
bottomBanner.subtitle: Start your preparation early with structured learning and regular practice.

additionalInfo.board: CISCE (Council for the Indian School Certificate Examinations)

streams.Commerce: Accounts, Business Studies, Economics, English, +1 Elective
streams.Humanities: History, Political Science, Economics/Sociology/Psychology, English, +1 Elective

additionalInfo.internalAssessment: 20% weightage in final ISC Class 12 marks
